directions: Whisk 1? cups milk, 1 cup mayo, sugar, ? t salt, and 2 t pepper in bowl. Cook pasta. Drain pasta and return to pot. Add vinegar and toss until absorbed. Cool pasta 10 minutes, then stir in dressing until pasta is well coated. Cool completely. Add carrot, celery, remaining milk, and remaining mayo to pot with pasta mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to serving bowl and refrigerate.
title: Hawaiian Macaroni Salad
